detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Withdrawable.withdrawEther(uint256,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MultipleEpochRewardsClaimer.sol#315-319):
	External calls:
	- (success) = sendTo.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MultipleEpochRewardsClaimer.sol#316)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- EtherWithdraw(amount,sendTo) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MultipleEpochRewardsClaimer.sol#318)
